21  package org.opencastproject.external.endpoint;
22  
23  import static java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
24  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.anyObject;
25  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.createMock;
26  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.createNiceMock;
27  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.expect;
28  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.expectLastCall;
29  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.replay;
30  import static org.opencastproject.index.service.util.CatalogAdapterUtil.getCatalogProperties;
31  
32  import org.opencastproject.elasticsearch.api.SearchResult;
33  import org.opencastproject.elasticsearch.api.SearchResultItem;
34  import org.opencastproject.elasticsearch.index.ElasticsearchIndex;
35  import org.opencastproject.elasticsearch.index.objects.series.Series;
36  import org.opencastproject.elasticsearch.index.objects.series.SeriesSearchQuery;
37  import org.opencastproject.index.service.api.IndexService;
38  import org.opencastproject.index.service.catalog.adapter.series.CommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter;
39  import org.opencastproject.mediapackage.MediaPackageElementFlavor;
40  import org.opencastproject.metadata.dublincore.MetadataList;
41  import org.opencastproject.metadata.dublincore.SeriesCatalogUIAdapter;
42  import org.opencastproject.security.api.Organization;
43  import org.opencastproject.security.api.Role;
44  import org.opencastproject.security.api.SecurityService;
45  import org.opencastproject.security.api.User;
46  import org.opencastproject.series.api.SeriesService;
47  import org.opencastproject.util.NotFoundException;
48  import org.opencastproject.util.PropertiesUtil;
49  import org.opencastproject.util.data.Arrays;
50  
51  import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
52  import org.easymock.EasyMock;
53  import org.junit.Ignore;
54  
55  import java.util.Date;
56  import java.util.HashMap;
57  import java.util.HashSet;
58  import java.util.LinkedList;
59  import java.util.List;
60  import java.util.Map;
61  import java.util.Optional;
62  import java.util.Properties;
63  import java.util.Set;
64  
65  import javax.ws.rs.Path;
66  
67  @Path("")
68  @Ignore
69  public class TestSeriesEndpoint extends SeriesEndpoint {
70  
71    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
72    public TestSeriesEndpoint() throws Exception {
73  
74      this.endpointBaseUrl = "https://api.opencast.org";
75  
76      // Prepare mocked organization
77      Organization org = createNiceMock(Organization.class);
78      expect(org.getId()).andStubReturn("opencast");
79      replay(org);
80  
81      Set<Role> roles = new HashSet<>();
82      Role roleStudent = createNiceMock(Role.class);
83      expect(roleStudent.getName()).andStubReturn("ROLE_STUDENT");
84      roles.add(roleStudent);
85      Role roleUser = createNiceMock(Role.class);
86      expect(roleUser.getName()).andStubReturn("ROLE_USER_92623987_OPENCAST_ORG");
87      roles.add(roleUser);
88  
89      // Prepare mocked user
90      User user = createNiceMock(User.class);
91      expect(user.getOrganization()).andStubReturn(org);
92      expect(user.getEmail()).andStubReturn("nowhere@opencast.org");
93      expect(user.getName()).andStubReturn("Opencast Student");
94      expect(user.getProvider()).andStubReturn("opencast");
95      expect(user.getUsername()).andStubReturn("92623987@opencast.org");
96      expect(user.getRoles()).andStubReturn(roles);
97      replay(user);
98  
99      // Prepare mocked security service
100     SecurityService securityService = createNiceMock(SecurityService.class);
101     expect(securityService.getOrganization()).andStubReturn(org);
102     expect(securityService.getUser()).andStubReturn(user);
103     replay(securityService);
104 
105     Series series1 = new Series("4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f", "opencast");
106     series1.setTitle("Via API");
107     series1.setDescription("A series created over the external API");
108     series1.setSubject("Topic");
109     series1.setCreator("Gracie Walsh");
110     series1.setCreatedDateTime(new Date(1429175556000L));
111     series1.addContributor("Nu'man Farooq Morcos");
112     series1.addContributor("Alfie Gibbons");
113     series1.addPublisher("Sophie Chandler");
114     series1.addOrganizer("Peter Feierabend");
115     series1.addOrganizer("Florian Naumann");
116     series1.addOrganizer("Niklas Vogler");
117     series1.setAccessPolicy(IOUtils.toString(TestSeriesEndpoint.class.getResourceAsStream("/series1-acl.json"), UTF_8));
118 
119     SearchResultItem<Series> searchResultItem1 = EasyMock.createNiceMock(SearchResultItem.class);
120     expect(searchResultItem1.getSource()).andStubReturn(series1);
121     replay(searchResultItem1);
122 
123     SearchResultItem<Series>[] searchResultItems = Arrays.array(searchResultItem1);
124 
125     SearchResult<Series> searchResult = createNiceMock(SearchResult.class);
126     expect(searchResult.getItems()).andStubReturn(searchResultItems);
127     replay(searchResult);
128 
129     ElasticsearchIndex elasticsearchIndex = createMock(ElasticsearchIndex.class);
130     expect(elasticsearchIndex.getByQuery(anyObject(SeriesSearchQuery.class))).andStubReturn(searchResult);
131     expect(elasticsearchIndex.getSeries("4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f", org.getId(), user)).andStubReturn(
132             Optional.of(series1));
133     expect(elasticsearchIndex.getSeries("unknown-series-id", org.getId(), user)).andStubReturn(Optional.empty());
134     replay(elasticsearchIndex);
135 
136     Map<String, String> series1Props = new HashMap<>();
137     series1Props.put("live", "false");
138     series1Props.put("ondemand", "true");
139 
140     CommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter commonAdapter = new CommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter();
141     Properties seriesCatalogProperties = getCatalogProperties(getClass(), "/series-catalog.properties");
142     commonAdapter.updated(PropertiesUtil.toDictionary(seriesCatalogProperties));
143     List<SeriesCatalogUIAdapter> adapters = new LinkedList<>();
144     adapters.add(commonAdapter);
145 
146     IndexService indexService = createNiceMock(IndexService.class);
147     expect(indexService.getSeriesCatalogUIAdapters()).andStubReturn(adapters);
148     expect(indexService.getCommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter()).andStubReturn(commonAdapter);
149     expect(indexService
150             .createSeries(EasyMock.anyObject(), EasyMock.anyObject(), EasyMock.anyObject(), EasyMock.anyObject()))
151             .andStubReturn("4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f");
152     expect(indexService.updateAllSeriesMetadata(EasyMock.anyString(), EasyMock.anyString(),
153             EasyMock.anyObject(ElasticsearchIndex.class))).andStubReturn(new MetadataList());
154     indexService.removeCatalogByFlavor(series1, MediaPackageElementFlavor.parseFlavor("missing/series"));
155     expectLastCall().andThrow(new NotFoundException("Missing catalog"));
156     indexService.removeCatalogByFlavor(series1, MediaPackageElementFlavor.parseFlavor("othercatalog/series"));
157     expectLastCall();
158     replay(indexService);
159 
160     SeriesService seriesService = createNiceMock(SeriesService.class);
161     expect(seriesService.getSeriesProperties("4fd0ef66-aea5-4b7a-a62a-a4ada0eafd6f")).andStubReturn(series1Props);
162     replay(seriesService);
163 
164     setElasticsearchIndex(elasticsearchIndex);
165     setIndexService(indexService);
166     setSecurityService(securityService);
167     setSeriesService(seriesService);
168   }
169 
170 }
